translations: v.管理不善，处理不当（mismanage 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: 75% of voters think the president has mismanaged the economy.
sentences.translation: 75%的选民认为总统对经济管理不当。

sentences.sentence: Not only does it run the country as a vast gulag, not only has it so mismanaged its economy, it also spreads mischief internationally.
sentences.translation: 它不单是像管理巨大的古格拉那样管理这个国家，不单将其经济管理得一塌糊涂，它还在国际上散播恶意。

sentences.sentence: Bolstering the economy, mismanaged by Mr Sharif, was one.
sentences.translation: 其中之一就是谢里夫在支持经济方面的管理不当。
